33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Udaisah bint Uhban bin Safi Al-Ghifari said:"Ali bin Abi Talib came to my father to call him to go out(to fight) with him. My father said to him: 'Indeed my beloved, the son of your paternal uncle, made a covenant with me, that when the people differ, to take a sword of wood. So I have resigned it, if you wish I will take it out with you.' She said: 'So he left him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي اتِّخَاذِ سَيْفٍ مِنْ خَشَبٍ فِي الْفِتْنَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been Related About Taking A Sword Of Wood(During Fitnah)
